main event: A UFO sighting was reported in Winston-Salem, N.C. on June 21, 1950, where an object hovered and then traveled rapidly.
interesting points: The sighted object was a circular, bright silver UFO approximately 30' - 40' in diameter., The UFO hovered at an elevation of about 25' before traveling rapidly in a westerly direction., The sighting lasted for about 3 minutes., No sound was heard during the entire observation., The investigator for the report was Sgt. Ralph Holder.
witness description: Civilians with no specific identification were involved in previous reports.
